name: TeamJumpers
description:
TeamJumpers is a good old fashioned teamwork platformer game in which you face high obstacles and challenging levels, In this game, you will need to rely on each other's ability to cooperate to get through these levels. Don't have anyone to play with, or just stuck at home during quarantine? Lonesome Square Mode's got your back! This is a singleplayer version of the game in which you go it alone and do it yourself!

Features include

Public Test Zone (PTZ) Online Multiplayer

Singleplayer Lonesome Square mode

Remote Play Support

Local Multiplayer (Sharing a keyboard or using controllers)

Xbox One Controller Support

Short and Simple (Straight to the point)
